item.title: HTML TABLES
item.description: This is the first in a series of articles that will use historical data from NFL seasons between 1992 and 2016 to illustrate some data munging, analysis, and visualization techniques in R. Pro-Football-Reference.com has a wealth of freely available detailed historical data. We are going to use rvest and dplyr, part of the tidyverse, to scrape, clean, and concatenate that historical data. library(rvest) library(dplyr) library(readr) library(ggplot2) library(ggthemes) Why should we automate this?
